Text: San Diego Pricing Matrix Updateafter some analysis and internal communication weve decided to increase the standard term options The SDGE Daily Price Sheet will now exhibit Enron offers for and year terms with all terms ending in May of the final contract year The value of the year months term is a hard sell and comprises only a small portion of concluded deals The new terms should address this issue and provide a backdrop of more aggressive prices Keep in mind that if you have customers requesting the year price its not a problem If you have any questions or concerns please do not hesitate to call Regards Marcus x
